scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.debug: concurrently -n "client,server" "npm run client" "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--inspect-brk=9229 npm run server"
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.render-postbuild: cd client && NODE_ENV=production npm install && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cd ../server && npm install
